1.title: Smokin' in the Square
1.plot: Professional cooks with the Alabama Barbecue Association compete at Smokin' In The Square in beautiful Pensacola Florida. Watch the Bama-Q pros sling sauce, talk trash and battle it out for cash and the coveted hand carved red cedar pelican trophy.

2.title: Smoke on Falls
2.plot: Professional cook teams with the Alabama Barbecue Association compete at Smoke on the Falls at beautiful Noccalula Falls in Gadsden, Alabama. Watch the Bama-Q pros sling sauce, talk trash and battle it out for cash and top awards.

3.title: High on the Hog
3.plot: The Alabama Barbecue Association pros battle it out in stormy weather at High on the Hog in Winchester, Tennessee for trophies and cash awards.

4.title: Whistle Stop Weekend
4.plot: The Alabama Barbecue Association pros take you inside Competition Barbecue as they battle it out for Grand Champion at Whistle Stop Weekend in Huntsville, Alabama.

5.title: Barber-Que
5.plot: The Bama-Q barbecue pros race to the finish line at Barber-Que at the famous Barber Motorsports Park in Leeds, Alabama.

6.title: Desoto Shrine Club BBQ Cook Off
6.plot: Bama-Q crosses the state line and takes on the Mississippi pros at the charitable Desoto Shrine Club BBQ Cook Off in Nesbit.

7.title: Cotton Pickin' BBQ Cook Off
7.plot: The Bama-Q pros are short on teams until a ringer steps in and turns up the heat at the Cotton Pickin' BBQ Cook-off competition in Hartselle, Alabama.

8.title: Big Brothers, Big Sisters Riverfest
8.plot: The Bama-Q pros battle it out for the North Alabama Triple Crown at Big Brothers Big Sisters Riverfest in Decatur, Alabama.

9.title: PorktoberQue
9.plot: The Bama-Q pros get fired up to win as a international team steps in to take them on at PorktoberQue in Dothan, Alabama.

10.title: The World Food Championship
10.plot: The Specialist and BootyQue take on cooks with the International Barbeque Cookers Association (IBCA) and new ABA member Tina Cannon teams up with Suzanne Burton to compete in the Cowboy Charcoal Fire and Ice women's competition at The World Food Championship in Orange Beach, Florida.

11.title: World Food Championship 2
11.plot: The Bama-Q pros battle it out against teams from all over the country and all over the world for top prize in KCBS competition barbecue at The World Food Championship in Orange Beach, Florida.

12.title: Christmas on the River
12.plot: The Bama-Q pros battle it out for top prize and some cool custom trophies at Christmas on the River in Demopolis, Alabama.

13.title: Timber Creek Lodge
13.plot: The Bama-Q pros serve up a feast, recap the past season and talk about their plans for next year at the beautiful Timber Creek Lodge in Crestview Florida.

imdb.plot outline: Follow members of the Alabama Barbecue Association (Pro and Backyard Divisions) as they compete against the best of the best BBQ teams from all over the US. Come hang out with us and get a peek into competition BBQ and what it's really like on the BBQ circuit in the Southeast.
imdb.title: Bama-Q
plot: Follow members of the Alabama Barbecue Association (Pro and Backyard Divisions) as they compete against the best of the best BBQ teams from all over the US. Come hang out with us and get a peek into competition BBQ and what it's really like on the BBQ circuit in the Southeast.
